title: Brown Stink Bugs in North America

content.prompt: Which of the following characteristics of the brown marmorated stink bug has led to them being an invasive species in North America?

choices.label: They are tolerant of a wide range of environmental conditions.
They are often eaten by native wasps and birds.
They have only a few surviving offspring each year.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
